subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Bone Fractures
lead_paragraph: The Villanova backup center Casiem Drummond broke his right ankle in the Wildcats’ second-round victory against Siena and will miss the rest of the tournament. Drummond was set to have a screw inserted into the ankle Tuesday. Villanova said the injury was unrelated to the stress fracture in the same ankle that sidelined him earlier this season.
